body.name: Mattel Disney and Pixar Cars Playset with 3 Toy Vehicles & 2 Ways to Play, Frank Escape & Stunt Race Playset Includes Lightning McQueen
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 52 mins
features: Featuring 3 character cars and 2 ways to play, the Frank Escape and Stunt Race playset brings an iconic Cars scene to life!
Frank, the menacing combine, is ready for anything, and kids can choose the Frank Escape or Stunt Race to try to get away -- both are easy to set up!
Frank Escape mode is a straight shot escape: launch Lightning McQueen from Frank to stay ahead -- and tip the tractor and the welcome to Radiator Springs sign!
Stunt Race challenges kids to launch up and over the ramp to execute a jump over the hay bales and escape.
Lightning McQueen, a tractor and Frank combine vehicles are all included for out-of-the-box fun!
With so much action, the playset makes a great collectible toy for kids and Cars fans ages 4 years old and up.
body.description: With three character cars to recreate one of Disney and Pixar's Cars iconic scenes, the Frank Escape and Stunt Race playset is an exciting action-packed way to play with favorite characters. Remember, tractor tipping is all fun and games until Frank shows up! The set has two easy to set up configurations: Frank Escape and Stunt Race. In Frank Escape mode, Lightning McQueen will move in a straight shot to avoid the menacing Frank vehicle chasing after him, knocking over an unassuming tractor and Welcome to Radiator Springs sign in the process. Stunt Race mode sets up a ramp to jump over the hay bales and escape the angry combine. With everything for out of the box play, including Lightning McQueen, a tractor and Frank, who doubles as a launcher, the set makes a great gift for Cars fans ages 4 years old and up. Colors and decorations may vary.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Disney and Pixar Cars toys let kids launch into play with vehicles, haulers and track sets that inspire storytelling and fuel up fun! Favorite Cars characters are ready to roll into adventure or collector displays with looks fans will recognize from the screen! Imaginations can embark on road trips with no limits -- whether racing for the coveted Piston Cup, exploring Radiator Springs or traveling the world, it’s easy to win big with Cars!

Ready, Set, Race! Kids and fans are on the road to fun, laughs and racing adventures with Disney and Pixar Cars toys. Fans of the movies and series can collect the playsets and characters to recreate scenes and create new adventures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toy for the grandkids
reviews.reviewText: We have grandchildren and second cousins that are over a lot. Wanted something to keep them busy. This is great. The kids love setting it up and playing with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overpriced like all Cars merchandise
reviews.reviewText: It's a cute set but very basic, doesn't do much - it does connect with most of the other recent cars playsets that we have but I would just wait and get this on sale. Wish these playsets would come with any other car besides Lightning McQueen because we have about a dozen of him now and is he actually anyone's favorite?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun Cars set
reviews.reviewText: Disney Mattel Cars play set. Features Lighting McQueen, Frank the combine and a tractor. Comes with a track, ramp and 3 hay stacks. Appropriate for ages 4+. Combine has push button action.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 4 year old loves this!! It was very easy for my husband to put together and him and our son played with this a good hour afterwards. He absolutely loves it! This is a great gift for any young one who loves them some Lightning McQueen and Frank! Love that it came with the extra tractor and hay stacks. It is his new favorite toy!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars RUN! FRANK IS GOING TO GET YOU!
reviews.reviewText: My son (4 years old) is a HUGE Lightning McQueen fan! For Christmas 2022, I got him the first Radiator Springs track set and since then we've been collecting pieces to add to it. So when I saw this, I knew I had to get this for his upcoming birthday in March. We love the tractor tipping scene with Frank and I hadn't been able to find any Frank vehicles, so I was both suprised and excited to find this piece. I literally screamed when I saw it. My son is going to love it! I can't wait to give it to him.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for any lightning McQueen lover
reviews.reviewText: This toy was a great gift for my nephew who’s obsessed with the movie cars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for your Lightning McQueen fans!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great toy for your Cars and Lightning McQueen fans! The track easily adds to the others in this play set, but could definitely still be enjoyed If it is the first piece a kiddo gets in this track set. I think makes a great gift!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Gift for a McQueen Fan
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This Frank Escape and Stunt playset is fun to play with by its self and also makes a great addition to the coordinating playsets. Frank's pull back spring action is powerful, so the plastic, Lightning McQueen car really flies. I'm sure that it would also work with a McQueen die cast car. The set can be used with the ramp up or down allowing McQueen to either fly through the air or race straight away knocking over the tractor, flying through the gates, and spinning the town sign. This is a great gift for any little, McQueen fan. Highly Recommend
